replies.body: When is season 7 of GOT coming out?

> [{quoted}](name=Dri,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=5um5HpsE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-29T19:22:06.837+0000)
>
> When is season 7 of GOT coming out?

http://www.digitalspy.com/tv/game-of-thrones/feature/a793488/game-of-thrones-season-7-release-date-spoilers-cast-and-everything-you-need-to-know/
> HBO has made a habit of debuting new GoT episodes in the spring - so bar any major shift in the cabler's scheduling patterns, you can expect the next season in April 2017.


Hope that helps!
Can anyone explain to me what this is meant to accomplish?

like the other guy said, it is meant to give more rewards to solo queue-ers. As it is now, its kind of unfair when solo players get the same lp as premades for a win, because it is much harder to win games as solo, not to mention the teams are so unpredictable if you don't have a duo with you.
Thats why riot need to bring back solo queue.
No, people just need to find one to two good friends and play with them if they don't like the solo queue, lol, easy.
what happens if all your friends became rust nerds and don't play league any more?
Then you either stop playing League of Legends or you get over it, there are other solo players out there and if you can bond well with people then you are instantly at an advantage.

completely defeats the purpose of the game, especially if your friends are worse than you. It will go from trying to improve your champ skill to trying to find a duo that will carry the hardest. Which is why a queue just for solos would be much better.

The point isn't to be carried, it's to have someone to rely on, or, like I said to the other comment, "get over it, there are other solo players out there and if you can bond well with people then you are instantly at an advantage.".
so there would be a quad q and a solo q that are separate that wont affect the q times at all
how on earth will quad queue find a single person if no one solo queued?

It gives more recognition to solo players. Reddit complained about adding something like this for weeks. 

TBH it's not a good idea since the Dynamic icons are just a mark of shame really, and a lot of players see them as a "I'm boosted" icon.
what's Dynamic? pls explain
When I said "Dynamic icons" I was referring to the icons you'll get when you queue as a pre-made in Dynamic Queue

Solo queuers: You'll get told you have no friends.
Duo/trio queuers: You'll get called boosted/carried
Team: You'll get flamed for abusing the dynamic queue system.

I'm sure Riot didn't intend it to cause toxicity, but it sure as hell will.
its a start...they clearly said they are "exploring" this, so stop whining like a baby and go with it.
Riot Geo is a boosted animal :P
{{champion:121}}
ADD ME BOIS TEMPNAMEB388{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
let me guess you have 165 champion points on bard
you also figured out the champions glitch?
i think they have fixed it now tho
yeh
cri only lvl 2 udyr thats sad
and on this day, the toxicity levels were tripled :/ stupid idea, nothing but shame icons for people who play this team game as a team.
I notice you mention, Dynamic Ranked.  There is no ranking in Aram, the only field I play, generally, so how does this affect summoners similar to myself?

> [{quoted}](name=mcsmithaus,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=5um5HpsE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-29T19:34:36.956+0000)
>
> I notice you mention, Dynamic Ranked.  There is no ranking in Aram, the only field I play, generally, so how does this affect summoners similar to myself?

It won't; these emblems are unique to Ranked Dynamic Queue!

No surprise, Wukie!
;)
Yay finally a mark of shame for all those boosted animals!{{summoner:1}}
Boosted animal stamp

Don't make it last 25 wins. Just go by % of games overall and set the threshold at 75%

Over 75% of games as solo. SoloQ Player Emblem.
Over 75% of games as a boosted animal. Boosted animal Player emblem.
Over 75% of games as full team. Full team player emblem.

Using the last 25 games is stupid. Someone could get boosted over 150-200 games then play the most recent 25 as solo and then claim to have the same status as a solo player.

There's so many problems with that emblem system it's just stupid. Stop trying to bring casual players into ranked, put them in normals.
Yay now you an more easily identify and ban the boosted animals
Am I the only one who reckons its sweet if u have dynamic if you play solo then duo (queue) with people from that game?
Is DuoQ classed as dynamic queue?

> [{quoted}](name=Koy,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=5um5HpsE,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-06-30T01:19:03.972+0000)
>
> Is DuoQ classed as dynamic queue?

Yup! If you premade a majority of the 25 games, you'll be given either the Dynamic or the Team emblem.

>Claim a dynamic emblem by winning with a mix of premade sizes
